entry.title: P&S DOUBLE BLACK RAGS TO RICHES ***
entry.s:vendor: P&S Double Black Renny Doyle Collection
entry.summary:
Vendor: P&S Double Black Renny Doyle Collection
Type: soap
Price: 22.25 - 45.57 (2 variants)

GETTING RID OF HYDROPHOBIC TOWELS!

Rags to Riches is the next generation of microfiber detergents using new breakthrough in cleaning technology.  The advanced formula deep cleans and restores absorbency and colour to microfiber towels including those used with professional cleaning and detailing products.

Formulated for use with al residential and commercial washing machines, including High Efficiency.  Safe on all textile types including microfiber, cotton, chamois, and other fabric blends.

  • For small or lightly soiled loads, use 1 oz.
  • For large loads use 2 oz.
  • Pre-soak heavily soiled and/or hydrophobic towels in a bucket of water mixed with 1-2 oz prior to washing for best results.  
  • Wash with warm water and dry on a low heat setting or hang dry. 
  • Do not use with fabric softeners and avoid mixing microfiber products with non-microfiber products.

entry.title: Renny Doyle Black Diamond Collection -DYNAMIC DRESSING - HYPER CONCENTRATED DRESSING ***
entry.s:vendor: P&S Double Black Renny Doyle Collection
entry.summary:
Vendor: P&S Double Black Renny Doyle Collection
Type: Leather Treatment
Price: 129.99

Description

The product is synonymous to the Dynamic Dressing name. The versatility of Dynamic Dressing is incredible. Dynamic Dressing may be used at full strength for a high gloss finish or diluted up to 4 to 1 with water. Even at it’s full dilution, Dynamic Dressing has strong gloss and actually can be further diluted for more natural looks. Lower dilutions can be judiciously wipe applied for extreme gloss or extra dry surfaces. All concentrations can be spray applied or wipe applied. The product is very pleasant to use and is guaranteed not to cause any window fogging with interior use. Dynamic Dressing is a perfect product for all dressing applications. Since Dynamic is so concentrated it may be used at varying dilution ratios depending upon desired performance. Dynamic dilutes with water anywhere from 1:1 for a high gloss finish and up to 4:1 for a natural finish. So, at its full dilution, 1 gallon will make five gallons of usable dressing. One product for multiple applications makes product management easier.(Gals.- 4 per case, 5's)

  • Dilutable up to 4 to 1
  • Hyper Concentrate
  • Fresh Banana Scent
  • Interior/Exterior
  • Variable Gloss Technology

Description

This High Action D/A Soft Wool Correction Pad was designed for use with high action dual action polishers like the RUPES or FLEX polishers. These tools tend to be tough on pads and this pad is built to withstand the pressure associated with these tools.

This versatile pad was built to perform with a variety or products from aggressive compounds to finish products. The P2703 Pad will remove sand scratches, scratches, serious paint imperfections along with minor correction issues and produce an amazing finish. The wool construction allows it to correct like a traditional wool pad but leave "no swirls" when used with D/A tools.

  • 100% Soft Wool Correction Pad
  • Use with RUPES or FLEX polishers
  • Foam Interface Pad
  • 6.50" pad face
  • Velcro attachment

entry.s:vendor: P&S Double Black Renny Doyle Collection
entry.summary:
Vendor: P&S Double Black Renny Doyle Collection
Type: Glass Treatment
Price: 139.99

Description

The request for a glass coating have never stopped and we are pleased to add VUE Glass Coating to our Inspiration lineup of products. VUE is the perfect compliment to a detail or coating job. VUE is an easy to install product adding protection to glass for up to 6 months or longer. VUE comes packaged in a blue 30 ml bottle offering up to 10 windshield coatings plus per container. A winning combination is to polish the glass with Clarity Creme, prep the glass with Paint Prep and add protection with VUE Glass Coating. (Kit Includes: 1 - 30 ml bottle of Inspiration, 1 coating applicator, instruction sheet & 4 door jamb labels)

VUE INSPIRATION Glass Coating is formulated for use by professionals and proper procedures must be followed for effective application and results. We do not recommend product use or application by untrained individuals.

  • Durable Glass Coating
  • Resistant to Chemical & UV Damage
  • Creates Hydrophobic Layer
  • Repels Water & Dirt
  • 3D Crosslinking Polymer

entry.title: Double Black Renny Doyle Collection Clarity Creme Glass Polish ***
entry.s:vendor: P&S Double Black Renny Doyle Collection
entry.summary:
Vendor: P&S Double Black Renny Doyle Collection
Type: Glass Treatment
Price: 28.99 - 52.99 (2 variants)

Description

One of the biggest challenges for detailers is the ability to create crystal clear glass. Over time exterior glass accumulates water spots, mineral deposits, calcium build up, wiper blade residue, etc. and glass cleaner will no longer do the trick. Glass needs to be polished back to its original condition.

Clarity Creme Glass Polish quickly and effectively removes particulate to create a smooth OEM glass finish. Clarity Creme Glass Polish may be used by hand or machine to restore glass or used in preparation for the installation of Inspiration Vue Glass coating.

Wash glass and clay glass if necessary. For light duty polishing use by hand with micro fiber towel, For medium duty cleaning and beyond use machine paired with foam or wool pad depending upon severity. Polish using over lapping pattern either by hand or machine until glass is restored to original condition. Repeat as necessary. Once complete allow for polish to dry to haze and polish to bright finish.

  • Restores Glass Clarity
  • Removes Water Spots
  • Prep & Polish For Vue Coating
  • Fast & Effective
entry.s:tag: Brand_P&S Double Black Renny Doyle Collection
Double Black Diamond Renny Doyle Collection

    The process is simple! Make sure the interior of the vehicle is clean and dry prior to treatment. Treatment takes one hour. ODOR DOC is 8 times stronger than traditional chlorine dioxide treatments and destroys the toughest of odors.

entry.title: Double Black Renny Doyle Iron Buster - Iron Remover for Wheels and Painted Surfaces
entry.s:vendor: P&S Double Black Renny Doyle Collection
entry.summary:
Vendor: P&S Double Black Renny Doyle Collection
Type: paint correction
Price: 24.37 - 459.99 (3 variants)

Iron Buster Iron Remover for Wheel & Paint Decon, is a colour changing, fast acting, pH balanced cleaner formulated to safely dissolve ferrous particulate from wheel and painted surfaces. Iron Buster iron remover will safely and effectively remove embedded iron particulate along with other contaminants from wheels and painted surfaces. Once applied product will quickly change to a purple colour when iron particulate is plentiful and then can be rinsed to produce a clean surface. 

For paint - Wash and dry surface prior to product application for maximum effectiveness. Pre washing for wheels is not required. Once surface has been prepared spray apply a generous amount of Iron Buster to the paint and/or wheels. Allow product to dwell for 2 - 5 minutes. Do not alloy product to fully dry on surface. Rinse thoroughly with water using hose or pressure washer. Repeat process if necessary.

entry.title: Double Black Renny Doyle IK Bead Maker - Heavy Duty Sprayer
entry.s:vendor: P&S Double Black Renny Doyle Collection
entry.summary:
Vendor: P&S Double Black Renny Doyle Collection
Type: Equipment
Price: 40.99

  • 35 oz Pump Sprayer
  • Includes mist or fan tip
  • Heavy Duty Sprayer
  • Suitable For Other Products
  • Bead Maker product NOT included, sold separately

Bead Maker now makes paint protection easier and faster than ever before. The proper sprayer is a key component of ideal product performance. The IK Bead Maker Sprayer is a heavy duty sprayer and the perfect solution to make product application effortless. Simply pump up the IK Bead Maker Heavy Duty Sprayer, select the desired tip, mist or fan and apply Bead Maker. Bead Maker may be applied to wet or dry vehicles and is safe to spray all exterior surfaces. Bead Maker also does include UV Protection - we use a combination of a UV filter and UV stabilizers. What makes Bead Maker different is the surface migrating molecule that attaches to the paint surface of a vehicle. Once attached this molecule cross-links and polymerizes on the surface thus building a hydrophobic durable layer of protection. Cure time is essentially two hours depending upon ambient conditions. 35oz bottle.

  • Eliminates Odours
  • No Chemical Residue
  • Oxygen Safe Cleaning
  • Minimizes Re-soiling

Carpet Finisher Peroxide Treatment is Step #3 in the Double Black Diamond Interior Cleaning System. Carpet Finisher Peroxide Treatment completes the system by adding a final attack on odour causing molecules and organic stains. Carpet Finisher Peroxide Treatment breaks down odour causing chemicals, eliminates any residual organic stains and slightly sterilizes the surface. Carpet Finisher Peroxide assists in reducing water stains, mold and mildew odours as well as finalized stain removal. Carpet Finisher Peroxide breaks down into oxygen and water, leaving no chemical residue left that requires further removal.

entry.title: Double Black Renny Doyle Ego Maker Compound
entry.s:vendor: P&S Double Black Renny Doyle Collection
entry.summary:
Vendor: P&S Double Black Renny Doyle Collection
Type: Paint Treatment
Price: 54.99

  • Efficient Cut Technology
  • High Action D/A Compatible
  • Forced Rotation Ready
  • Body Shop Safe

Ego Maker Compound is designed for use with high action, forced rotation or traditional rotary polishers. Ego Maker Compound restores the paint finish by removing sanding marks, scratches, and other paint imperfections. Ego Maker Compound aggressively cleans the clear coat paint surface preparing it for final stage paint correction. Ego Maker pairs well with all types of pads and tools. The key feature of Ego Maker is the finish left behind after correction. We categorize Ego Maker as a uniform cleaning compound featuring a high purity refined alumina abrasive with a tightly controlled particle size and shape. This unique feature is what allows Ego Maker to cut but leave a bright finish. Safe for use in body shops. Contains no wax or silicone.

entry.title: Double Black Renny Doyle Upholstery & Carpet Cleaning System
entry.s:vendor: P&S Double Black Renny Doyle Collection
entry.summary:
Vendor: P&S Double Black Renny Doyle Collection
Type: Carpet Care and Upholstrey
Price: 116.59

  • 3 Product System
  • For Use On Upholstery, Cloth & Carpet
  • Effectively Cleans 95% Of Interior Stains
  • Versatile Enzyme Package
  • Cleans & Deodorizes
  • Works w/All Cleaning Methods; Steam, Extraction or Dry Method

The Double Black interior carpet cleaning system is the perfect solution to address all types of interior cloth/upholstery cleaning applications. This carpet cleaning system is comprised of three products developed to work together to clean and deodorize automotive interiors. These unique products of been produced to work in combination with each other to clean 95% of all automotive stains. It is a total comprehensive 3 product system for cleaning cloth & carpet. The versatile enzyme package in Terminator is the backbone of the interior system designed to attack stains. Terminator contains a broad spectrum enzyme package consisting of: protease, lipase, cellulase & amylase. Terminator breaks down proteins, fats and plant stains. Terminator is pH and ion balanced for optimum enzyme cleaning efficiency.

Once stains are broken down Carpet Bomber is designed to now lift all the broken down material left behind after Terminator. Carpet Bomber features a light alkaline makeup to also help dissolve oils and improve the efficiency of the cleaners.

Finisher is the final punch to attack any remaining odour causing bacteria. The remaining stains can be bleached to eliminate any residual organic stains and slightly sterilizes the surface. No chemical is left that requires further removal. The system is formulated to clean, deodorize and sterilize interiors thus leaving a fresh scent free clean interior. The benefit if the system is it works with all cleaning methods; steam, extraction & dry method.

 Complete Kit Includes:

  • 1 gallon of Terminator 
  • 1 gallon of Carpet Bomber 
  • 1 gallon of Finisher
  • One Rotary/Dual Action Cleaning Brush
  • One Hand Carpet Scrub Brush
  • 3 HD Sprayers
  • 1 empty Spray Bottle for each product (3 spray bottles total)

entry.title: Double Black Renny Doyle Paint Coating Surface Prep
entry.s:vendor: P&S Double Black Renny Doyle Collection
entry.summary:
Vendor: P&S Double Black Renny Doyle Collection
Type: Paint Protection
Price: 5.99 - 58.99 (3 variants)

  • Prep Solution for Inspiration Coating
  • Cleans Paint Surfaces
  • Removes Wax, Silicone & Other Contaminants
  • Allow Product To Work For 30 Seconds
  • Available in pints

Paint Coating Surface Prep is an exterior car detailing  solution used to prep vehicle surfaces prior to the application of automotive coatings. This product works by removing any and all residue left over from prior polishing compounds, wax, or other contaminants to ensure the performance of the final coating application is not hindered in any way.  Paint Coating Surface Prep is specifically formulated to be used alongside Inspiration Ceramic Coating as part of the P&S Double Black Renny Doyle Collection. A must have paint protection product for easy exterior vehicle detailing.

To properly clean exterior vehicle surface prior to applying Inspiration Ceramic Coating, spray a modest amount of Paint Coating Surface Prep to the paint surface. Allow the product to sit for 30 seconds and wipe clean, frequently rotating towel to ensure proper product removal. Repeat process over the entire vehicle.

Inspiration Ceramic Coating provides an exceptional layer of durable long lasting protection unlike traditional wax products. Inspiration Ceramic Coating cures to form a solid molecular barrier impervious to chemicals, corrosion, UV exposure and high temperatures. Inspiration creates an impenetrable hydrophobic layer of protection.

Kit Includes: One 30 ml OR 50ml bottle of Inspiration, 1 coating applicator, instruction sheet & door jamb label.

Inspiration Exterior Ceramic Coating is formulated for use by professionals and proper procedures must be followed for effective application and results. We do not recommend product use or application by untrained individuals. Prior to product application a complete paint correction process must be performed and vehicle paint surface must be cleaned using Inspiration Prep. READ ENCLOSED PRODUCT TRAINING INFORMATION PRIOR TO ATTEMPTING INSTALLATION.

entry.title: Double Black Renny Doyle Envy Jeweling Polish
entry.s:vendor: P&S Double Black Renny Doyle Collection
entry.summary:
Vendor: P&S Double Black Renny Doyle Collection
Type: Paint Treatment
Price: 69.99

Envy Jeweling Polish is designed as a finish polish giving the paint a “jewelled” appearance once polished. Use with high action, forced rotation and traditional polishers. Envy Jeweling Polish contains an extra fine abrasive package designed give your paint a wet or jewelled appearance. The resulting deep gloss will give your paint restoration a show car quality finish without fillers which hide imperfections, meaning it will create a lasting gloss that is ideally suited for a coating applications and high end paint correction projects.
